entry.title: Reading group materials: StockÂ Embeddings
entry.summary: My presentation notes for a seminar that I recently gave at the University of Edinburgh on dense representation learning for financial applications.
entry.content:
On 2023-05-03, I gave a seminar at the Statistical Physics Reading Group in the ICMCS of the University of Edinburgh about dense representation learning for financial applications, specifically about Stock Embeddings from this paper.

These are my presentation notes in PDF format: click.

Have fun with my notes! :-)
